title: All the new movies and TV shows streaming in December
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Streaming A full list of what to watch on Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, HBO Max, Disney+, Paramount+, Apple TV, and Peacock in December 2025.
Josh O’Connor and Josh Brolin in "Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery.
" John Wilson/Netflix By Kevin Slane December 4, 2025 | 4:35 PM 13 minutes to read We’ve reached December, which in the streaming world translates to a glut of holiday movies and holiday TV shows.

title: Charlie McAvoy returns to practice with Bruins weeks after taking puck to face
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "To see him hurt like that in Montreal and to see him back like this with a smile, he’s all happy and excited.
" Charlie McAvoy returned to practice on Thursday, albeit in a non-contact jersey.

AP Photo/David Zalubowski By Conor Ryan December 4, 2025 | 4:29 PM 2 minutes to read A little over two weeks after taking a slap shot to the jaw, Bruins defenseman Charlie McAvoy was back on the ice and practicing with his teammates at Warrior Ice Arena on Thursday morning.

title: Former Boston detective pleads not guilty to drunk driving after initially dodging charges
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime Greg Walsh is accused of drunkenly backing a city-owned pickup truck into a Tesla in East Boston last year.
David L Ryan/The Boston Globe, File By Abby Patkin December 4, 2025 | 4:27 PM 3 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

One year after he dodged a drunk driving charge for allegedly crashing a city-owned truck, a former Boston police detective has been indicted on four counts in connection with the East Boston collision.

title: Here’s how Boston fared in this year’s traffic report
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Transportation Boston ceded its fourth-place spot in a 2025 ranking of U.
S.
cities with the most traffic congestion, though not for lack of trying.

title: JetBlue customers can now fly from Boston to this famous beach location
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights In celebration of the new route, JetBlue is offering fares as low as $59 one-way between Boston and Daytona Beach.
Daytona Beach in Florida.
flickr / Cactus Forest JetBlue is now flying between Boston and a famous beach in Florida.

title: Conn. teen arrested in Boston street takeover that saw police cruiser torched
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime David Antonio Moran, 19, will be charged in Connecticut as a fugitive from justice.
A Boston police cruiser on fire at the intersection of Massachusetts Avenue and Tremont Street.

Charlotte Aunger By Abby Patkin December 4, 2025 | 2:47 PM 1 minute to read A Connecticut man is facing charges as Boston police allege he was part of a crowd responsible for igniting a police cruiser with fireworks during an Oct.

title: Tom Brady moves Patriots into the top spot of his NFL power rankings
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: New England Patriots "This team passes the eye test, and Vrabel had them flying around on all three phases on Monday night.
" Tom Brady will be on the broadcast for the Packers-Bears game this Sunday (Daniel Kucin Jr.
/AP Photo).

title: Drake Maye gets into holiday spirit at Westwood farm
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Local News A 10-foot Christmas tree fit for No.
Drake Maye and his wife, Ann Michael, picked up a Christmas tree at the Bean Family Farm in Westwood last weekend.

title: Patriots’ TreVeyon Henderson named NFL’s Offensive Rookie of the Month
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots It's the first time a New England player has earned rookie of the month honors since Christian Gonzalez in 2023.
Patriots running back TreVeyon Henderson stiff arms Giants safety Dane Belton during New England's Dec.
1 win over New York.

title: Unknown intruder steals multiple wallets from City Hall offices
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News A man wearing a hat and mask gained access to authorized areas inside City Hall Monday and made off with multiple wallets and credit cards.
Boston City Hall.
Craig F.
